project_descr: Build and strengthen existing capacities within the justice and security sector institutions in Sierra Leone.

outputs.output_descr: This project helps the judiciary and justice chain institutions to develop bail and sentencing regulations to ensure adequate guidance and it also supports the introduction of electronic criminal case management in the courts.
donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
US Department of State, Office to monitor & combat Tracking in persons.

outputs.output_descr: From Prisons to Correctional Facilities: "Promoting Institutional Reform of the Sierra Leone Correctional Services (SLCS)"

This project seeks to strengthen rule of law, ensure equal access to justice for all, in particular those most marginalized. Interventions also seek to enhance security delivery in Sierra Leone in compliance with international human rights standards.
donor_name: US Department of State, Office to monitor & combat Tracking in persons.
